meanings.definition: A game played on a rectangular court by two or four players who hit a shuttlecock back and forth over a net using rackets.
meanings.sent1: We played badminton in the park with our friends.
meanings.sent2: Badminton is a popular sport in many countries.
meanings.sent3: During the picnic, we realized the only thing we forgot was the badminton set.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the shuttlecock in badminton is like music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The fast-paced nature of badminton keeps players on their toes.

meanings.definition: The shuttlecock used in the game of badminton.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally hit the badminton too hard, and it flew over the fence.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the badminton is in good condition before starting the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the badminton was a new toy and chased it around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The badminton floated gracefully through the air before landing softly on the court.
meanings.sent5: The feathers on the badminton create an elegant arc when struck.
